name: Kedi Trip
description:
Kedi Trip

A short single player narrative tale about my angry little cat and how much she loves her garden. The game currently has a very short play time but I hope you enjoy the day in the life of a cat.

This project was based upon the 2d shooter files presented by Michigan State Uni. Various changes have been made:

1.  A complete theme change. This is no longer your grandparents space shooter. The theme also includes a full narrative and characters.

2. Sprite change! After quickly learning to create pixel art, I  designed my own sprites, to completely change the way the game looks. Everything you see has been made by me!

3. Music and SFX changes. Some of the music has been sourced but a couple of the sound effects were recorded from my own pets.

4.  Additional levels. Originally the course project started out with 1 level, this has now been expanded to 3 chapters. Find out even more about Kedi!

5.  Expanded cut scenes to add to the drama! With audio and SFXs as well.

One of the more complete projects I've recently done.

Created by Daryl J Peel
